about_the_game:
"Fire in the Dark" is a unique psychological horror game. Immerse yourself in a story where reality and fictional worlds intertwine, uncovering the secrets and traumas of the main character. Solve the mysteries of her subconscious across two interconnected realities: her Room and the computer game.

STORY

At first glance, it seems like an ordinary story of a girl trapped in her room. But as you delve deeper, you realize the room conceals her inner fears, memories, and pain. In the computer game, you explore a dark forest, fight to survive by the campfire, and meet characters that embody the girl’s psychological struggles.

Every action in the room affects the game. Interact with objects, explore her personal space, and uncover subtle clues that help you progress in both worlds.

CHAPTERS

  • Chapter 1: A Lost Friend – Dive into a forest filled with darkness and mysteries. The girl’s first trauma is gradually revealed through symbolism and events.

  • Chapter 2: ???

  • Chapter 3: ???

  • Chapter 4: ???

FEATURES

  • Two interconnected worlds: The girl’s real-life room and the dark game on her computer.

  • Computer game exploration: A forest full of dangers, symbolizing fears and traumas.

  • Impactful actions: Everything you do in one world influences the other.

  • Horror atmosphere: Dark visuals, unsettling sounds, and constant tension.

  • Puzzles and symbolism: Every detail holds meaning and reveals the story.

  • Emotional narrative: A deep story of trauma, fears, and overcoming inner struggles.
